title: PlayStation NFTs, New Tekken, & More Huge Evo News! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.08.22
description:
Blessing is joined by Fighting Games Commentator Saint Cola to talk about Evo! Let's discuss PlayStation NFTs, a new Tekken, Multiversus' roadmap, and a whole lot more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start & Saint Cola is here!
00:08:18 - Housekeeping

This week is our PSILY Indie Darling bracket and we need you to help decide what games will make it onto the bracket. Go over to Patreon.com/KindaFunnyGames, find the submission form, and let us know what indie darling you think deserves a chance at greatness.

The Roper Report  -

00:09:51 - PlayStation is asking players about NFTs
00:18:42 - Tekken 8 may have just been teased
00:27:00 - MultiVersus has revealed its roadmap
00:33:07 - Ad
00:35:13 - Street Fighter 6 has revealed 2 new characters
00:41:27 - SNK is making a new Fatal Fury game
00:45:48 - Rollback Netcode Is Coming to Dragon Ball FighterZ
00:53:24 - Activision Blizzard has announced Call of Duty: Next
00:58:27 - Splatoon 3 is getting a Nintendo Direct this week
01:01:00 - Guilty Gear Strive has surpassed a million sales!
01:03:58 - Out today
01:05:27 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Tim
